required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of SCT-I10A Combined SCT200 or SCT-I10A Combined SCT200 Plus Chemotherapy in ESCC and CRC
clinical_study.official_title: To Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of SCT-I10A Combined SCT200 or SCT-I10A Combined SCT200 Plus Chemotherapy in Advanced Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma and Colorectal Cancer: a Phase Ⅰb, Open-label, Multicenter Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of SCT-I10A combined SCT200 or SCT-I10A combined SCT200 plus chemotherapy in advanced esophageal squamous cell carcinoma and colorectal cancer

detailed_description.textblock: This is a open label, multicenter, phase III study designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy in advanced esophageal squamous cell carcinoma and colorectal cancer treated with SCT-I10A combined SCT200 or SCT-I10A combined SCT200 plus chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.description: Including adverse events and safety of laboratory tests

secondary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as proportion of patients achieving complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) according to RECIST v1.1 or Lugano 2014 criteria during trial treatment

DOR is defined as time from the date when a patient first meets the criteria for CR or PR according to RECIST v1.1 or Lugano 2014 criteria, until the date that progressive disease (PD) is objectively documented or death, whichever occurs first
The achievement of any a stable response（SD）, partial response (PR) or complete response (CR), according to RECIST v1.1 or Lugano 2014 criteria
PFS is defined as the time from first dose of SCT200 until the date of first documentation of progression or date of death, whichever occurs first,according to RECIST v1.1 or Lugano 2014 criteria
OS is defined as time from first dose of SCT200 until the date of death from any cause

arm_group.description: SCT-I10A: 200 mg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q3W. SCT200: 6mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of QW, then 8mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q2W
SCT-I10A: 200 mg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q3W. SCT200: 6mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of QW, then 8mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q2W

arm_group.arm_group_label: SCT-I10A combined SCT200 plus Chemotherapy in CRC
arm_group.description: SCT-I10A: 200 mg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q3W. SCT200: 6mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of QW, then 8mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q2W. Chemotherapy: Capecitabine and Oxaliplatin.

intervention.description: 200 mg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q3W.
intervention.arm_group_label: SCT-I10A combined SCT200 plus Chemotherapy in CRC

intervention.description: 6mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of QW, then 8mg/kg intravenous (IV) on Day 1 of Q2W
